name: gramene-sites
description: Front end of gramene main and subsites

scripts.build-maize: SUBSITE=maize parcel build --no-scope-hoist --dist-dir maize src/maize.html && mv maize/maize.html maize/index.html
scripts.build-grapevine: SUBSITE=grapevine parcel build --no-scope-hoist --dist-dir grapevine src/grapevine.html && mv grapevine/grapevine.html grapevine/index.html
scripts.build-sorghum: SUBSITE=sorghum parcel build --no-scope-hoist --dist-dir sorghum src/sorghum.html && mv sorghum/sorghum.html sorghum/index.html
scripts.build-rice: SUBSITE=rice parcel build --no-scope-hoist --dist-dir rice src/rice.html && mv rice/rice.html rice/index.html

author: Andrew Olson
